title: Mariano Rajoy
summary: Mariano Rajoy Brey (Spanish: [maˈɾjano raˈxoj]; born 27 March 1955) is a Spanish politician who served as Prime Minister of Spain from 2011 to 2018, when a vote of no confidence ousted his government.[1][2] On 5 June 2018, he announced his resignation as People's Party leader.[3][4]
